short_description: fastpath function to give the column summary of the target columns.
long_description: fastpath function to give the count of NonNull, Null, Blank, Zero, Positive, Negative and NullPercentage and NonNullPercentage of the target columns

input_tables.name: InputTable
input_tables.rDescription: The relation that contains input data.
input_tables.description: The relation that contains input data.

argument_clauses.name: TargetColumns
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the input table columns for which column summary needs to be determined.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the input table columns for which column summary needs to be determined.
